message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,250,000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to both of us. Let me know what you think!

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. However, given my budget constraints, I am only able to offer $1,150,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $1,150,000 is unfortunately too low for me. I understand you have budget constraints, but I'm willing to come down to $1,180,000 to make this deal work. This price reflects the value of the product while acknowledging your budget limitations. Let's see if we can find common ground.
